entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
